description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is a simple anonymous reply to a complaint that Techdirt has become more politically biased: Perhaps it isn’t really Techdirt that has changed, have you ever considered that? In second place, it’s an anonymous comment about the UK moral panic about kids having phones: Yeah, […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
